channel.title: Warhammer40k on Art of Dmitry Brushray
channel.description: Recent content in Warhammer40k on Art of Dmitry Brushray

item.title: June Dmitry Brushray 24 Art mix
item.description: Mix of my artworks June 2024. Lord Krios the Siegebreaker Had a chance recently to paint some more chaos terminators. This time is a terminator chaos lord of a custom warband. He’s a former Iron Warrior that joined a Word Bearers warband called the Doomed. The image was painted from miniature reference: https://www.instagram.com/p/CwSXAkUtRiV/ And more description taken from there: Poliorkitikos Krios, a former Iron Warrior who joined the ranks of The Doomed warband, has rapidly risen through the command structure when the warband found its combat doctrine lacking in battles of attrition.

item.title: the Emperor of mankind, fan art by Dmitry Brushray
item.description: Hey everyone! Today I want to show you something really special. Ever since I started painting Warhammer fan art for many reasons I hadn’t been dared to think of approaching this potent figure, the Emperor of mankind. Besides required strong artistic skills one important reason was that I couldn’t see any good idea or a context to show him. Then it has come pretty sudden, I guess it could be called an inspiration.

item.title: Revamp of the ugliest fan art I ever painted, Necron Lord
item.description: Recently I picked this idea of repainting my old art. It helps to spot some problems and estimate my current progress. After making few revamps I decided to pick I guess one of my biggest fails. Every time I see the initial art I had made, it reminds me horrors of the warp. I still don’t know how it happened, after all I wasn’t that bad at that time but with this fan art something went really wrong.

item.title: November 23 Dmitry Brushray Art mix
item.description: Mix of my artworks November 2023. I keep painting chaos space marines. This guy has pretty unusual and bright colour scheme. He’s a chaos champion for a warband called the Reproached Hollows, He’s only known as “The Cyclopes” Special thanks to Littlerevy and her miniature reference: https://instagram.com/littlerevy?igshid=MzRlODBiNWFlZA== Roman warrior, short personal work, a painting study In this personal work called “Lady Victory” I was inspired by knights and medieval, fantasy vibes.
